description: ff. 198. 182 x 137; 133 x 95 mm. 17 lin.Rabīʻ I, 833. Acephalous fifth juzʼ (daʻwá through kitābah); according to colophon, this is the commentary by Aḥmad ibn ʻUmar al-Nasāʼī al-Mudlijī (d. 757/1355 - for vocalization of the nisbah cf. al-Suyūṭī, Lubb al-lubāb s.v.) on his own work: ḥājjī Khalīfah, Kashf al-ẓunūn, II, 574 (no. 3957); Fihris al-kutub al-mawjūdah bi-al-Maktabah al-Azharīyah, II, 542 (al-Daljī) - Brockelmann, GAL, II, 254 (2); S II, 271 mentions only the matn. Incip. (as extant): ... خمسة الدعوى والجواب والىمىن والنکول والبىنة bāb al-kitābah begins: ... قوله باب الکتابة سمى هذا العقد کتابة لما فىها
author: Mudlijī, Aḥmad ibn ʻUmar, d. 1355
creator: Mudlijī, Aḥmad ibn ʻUmar, d. 1355
subject: Mudlijī, Aḥmad ibn ʻUmar, d. 1355—Jāmiʻ al-mukhtaṣarāt wa-mukhtaṣar al-jawāmiʻ.
member_of_collections: Princeton Digital Library of Islamic Manuscripts
